instructions: Log in to MyBell . Click My services . Select the mobile phone with the rate plan you want to change. Click the My plan & features tab . Click Change my plan . Follow the on-screen instructions to change your rate plan. You ll also be able to review and change your features.

Image titled Cancel Amazon Prime Video on iPhone or iPad Step 1 1 Open a web browser on your iPhone or iPad. You can use Safari, which is the blue compass icon that's usually on the home screen. Image titled Cancel Amazon Prime Video on iPhone or iPad Step 2 2 Navigate to https://www.amazon.com/gp/primecentral . If you're not already signed in to your Amazon account, you'll be prompted to do so now. [1] Image titled Cancel Amazon Prime Video on iPhone or iPad Step 3 3 Scroll down and tap under Prime Video. A confirmation message will appear. [2] If you're using the Prime Video free trial, tap Do not continue . Image titled Cancel Amazon Prime Video on iPhone or iPad Step 4 4 Confirm the cancellation. You can continue using Prime Video until the final date in the billing cycle. Advertisement
